amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for employment of illegal workers as defined in the Immigration and Nationality Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-183 prohibit any funds in the Act from being used to employ illegal workers as defined in the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 349 - 84 (Roll no. 442).
